item.title: By: David Roberts
item.dc:creator: David Roberts
item.description: Thanks for saving these here. I went through and grabbed a bunch of posts from people reporting from the various workshops, to make sure their on-the-spot, at-the-time reactions are not lost. Unfortunately Christelle Vincent (@xl772)'s Storify she posted to G+ expired, so one has to dig out all the old tweets afresh somehow.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for saving these here. I went through and grabbed a bunch of posts from people reporting from the various workshops, to make sure their on-the-spot, at-the-time reactions are not lost. Unfortunately Christelle Vincent (@xl772)’s Storify she posted to G+ expired, so one has to dig out all the old tweets afresh somehow.
